****
* [[VUID-VkPipelineColorBlendAttachmentState-srcColorBlendFactor-parameter]] pname:srcColorBlendFactor must: be a valid elink:VkBlendFactor value
* [[VUID-VkPipelineColorBlendAttachmentState-dstColorBlendFactor-parameter]] pname:dstColorBlendFactor must: be a valid elink:VkBlendFactor value
* [[VUID-VkPipelineColorBlendAttachmentState-colorBlendOp-parameter]] pname:colorBlendOp must: be a valid elink:VkBlendOp value
* [[VUID-VkPipelineColorBlendAttachmentState-srcAlphaBlendFactor-parameter]] pname:srcAlphaBlendFactor must: be a valid elink:VkBlendFactor value
